task.title: How to Make Freshly-squeezed Orange Juice
task.shortdesc: This bright citrus drink will awaken your senses and propell you into the start of your day!

ul.li: 1/4 cup pineapple, peeled and core removed

step.cmd: Remove Juicer from cabinet above the stove.
Turn on the Juicer by pressing the red switch left to the ON setting.
Choose JUICE from the list of options.
Feed all of the ingredients through your juicer through the opening on the top.
Transfer to a large glass jar for storing.
Shake well to combine before serving.
